subject: The Skinny: Monday, April 23, 2007
body:

Nicolas 
      & Ségolène Trump Hillary & Rudy
Election news tops the front pages, but it's not Hillary, Barack, Rudy 
      and John making headlines. It's Nicolas and Ségolène. 
And Karl Rove gets into a 
      heated exchange over 
      global warming. 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.   More...
